Instruction: Pat the sweet potatoes dry with paper towels.
Mix eggs, brown sugar, flour, cloves, and cinnamon with sweet potatoes in a large bowl until well combined.
Heat oil in a large heavy skillet until it reaches 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Shape the mixture into patties, cook in hot oil until browned on one side for 2 to 3 minutes, then flip and brown the other side. Drain on paper towels before serving hot.

The nutritional content calculation is based on frying oil with an estimated 10% retention value post-cooking. Actual values may differ based on various factors such as duration, heat level, ingredient types, and oil specifics.
